block.p: FIEDLER-Anita. Loving wife of Norman D. Fiedler. Beloved mother of Duane M. Fiedler and the late Dana Fiedler-Teichman. Adored mother-in-law of Albert Teichman & Joanne Fiedler. Dear sister of Judd Gostin and sister-inlaw of Doris Fiedler & Roz Gostin. Cherished grandmother of Jason, Ross, Evan, Brad, Taylor & Sloan. Services July 3, 10 A.M., at The Riverside Memorial Chapel, 21 West Broad St., Mt. Vernon, N.Y.
FIEDLER-Anita. Your ambition and strength were an inspiration to all of us. In your memory we will uphold the Treasures tradition. We will miss you. Your Treasures
